Can't believe how I got such a masterpiece for a really low price on sale. And now it is free! Have spent nearly 1k hours and not bored even in the slightest. There is some initial grind but after that the game is really enjoyable. Also, there are other aspects of the game that are equally enjoyable if you do not like competitive mode such as kz, surf bhop even deathmatch wargames and danger zone are there. One of my favourite games of all time.

Been playing Counter-Strike since inception 1.3, 1.6, skipped source, tried early CS:GO and it was horrible, but overtime after many updates has developed into an exceptionally fine game.
